hudson.tasks.Shell.command: echo "Starting job" __ROBOT_FILE__ robot -d ${WORKSPACE}/output/ ${WORKSPACE}/executionFile.robot if [ ! -d /var/www/html/__EXECUTION_ID__ ]; then mkdir -p /var/www/html/__EXECUTION_ID__; fi cp ${WORKSPACE}/output/output.xml /var/www/html/__EXECUTION_ID__/output-__TCD_ID__.xml rebot -o ${WORKSPACE}/output/output-merged.xml /var/www/html/__EXECUTION_ID__/output*.xml robotmetrics --output ${WORKSPACE}/output/output-merged.xml --logo "5GEVE_logo_with_title.png" sudo mv metrics*.html /var/www/html/__EXECUTION_ID__/index.html sudo mv ${WORKSPACE}/output/report.html /var/www/html/__EXECUTION_ID__/report.html sudo mv ${WORKSPACE}/output/log.html /var/www/html/__EXECUTION_ID__/log.html
